borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint128).custom:security: Users must have sufficient collateral to borrow
borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint128).details: Borrows debt from the lending pool

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to liquidate

repayWithSelectedToken(address,address,u.custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function

params._fromPosition: Whether to repay from position balance
params._token: Address of the token used for repayment
params._user: Address of the user repaying the debt

supplyCollateral(address,uint256).custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function
supplyCollateral(address,uint256).details: Supplies collateral to the lending pool

params._user: Address of the user to supply collateral

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).custom:security: Users must approve tokens before calling this function
supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).details: Supplies liquidity to the lending pool

params._user: Address of the user to supply liquidity

withdrawCollateral(uint256).custom:security: Users must have sufficient collateral and maintain healthy positions
withdrawCollateral(uint256).details: Withdraws supplied collateral from the user's position

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).custom:security: Users must have sufficient shares to withdraw
withdrawLiquidity(uint256).details: Withdraws supplied liquidity by redeeming shares

params._shares: Number of shares to redeem for underlying tokens

borrowDebt(uint256,uint256,uint128).notice: This function allows users to borrow against their collateral

liquidation(address).notice: Anyone can call this function to liquidate unhealthy positions

repayWithSelectedToken(address,address,u.notice: This function allows users to repay their borrowed debt

supplyCollateral(address,uint256).notice: This function allows users to deposit collateral

supplyLiquidity(address,uint256).notice: This function allows users to provide liquidity for borrowing

withdrawCollateral(uint256).notice: This function allows users to withdraw their collateral

withdrawLiquidity(uint256).notice: This function allows users to withdraw their supplied liquidity
